name: Draft Graph Error Rate > 5%
message:
## Draft Graph Error Rate Elevated

The error rate for draft-graph endpoint has exceeded 5%.

**Current:** {{value}}%
**Threshold:** 5%
**Environment:** {{env.name}}

**Impact:** Users experiencing failures when generating drafts.

**Common Causes:**
- Anthropic API errors or rate limiting
- Engine validation failures
- Network connectivity issues
- Deployment regression

**Actions:**
1. Check error logs for patterns: `service:olumi-assistants env:{{env.name}} error`
2. Verify Anthropic API status
3. Check engine /v1/validate endpoint health
4. Review recent deployments

**Dashboard:** [Draft Service Metrics](https://app.datadoghq.com/dashboard/draft-service)
